price: Gara Rabbii baqadhaa. Ani Isa irraa isiniif sodaachisaa ifa bahaadha.
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
